name: Whack-A-Duck VR
description:
CONTROLS:

This game is meant for VR but for the WebGL build the keys are as follows:

HOLD the ALT Key + Mouse move - Move the Headset or Aim

Space Key or Left Mouse Button (LMB) - Hit them ducks! / Select.


This is a WebGL build of Whack-A-Duck VR, a Google Cardboard based VR project.

Take a day off and head to the beach. Why not whack some ducks while you're at it?

(Don't worry. The hammer is made of foam. They'll barely feel it.)

Smash that High Score and become the Whack-A-Duck champion!

Enjoy!
